skillTree.name: Speed of Asuryan
skillTree.description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Will of Asuryan
skillTree.description: The radiant glory of the Eldest God burns away the darkness

effects.description:
Ward Save: +5% for Phoenix and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Ward Save: +10% for Phoenix and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Knowledge of Things to Come
skillTree.description: An Anointed of Asuryan has known for centuries exactly how and when he will die. Accepting that unavoidable fate has made him completely unafraid of everyone and everything

skillTree.name: Frostheart Phoenix (Mount)
skillTree.description: The mystical Frostheart Phoenix is a creature of legends, and forms a deadly pairing with the Anointed.

effects.description: Enables the Frostheart Phoenix mount for the Anointed

Passive Ability: "For the Phoenix King", while this Mount is equipped, for Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Flamespyre Phoenix (Mount)
skillTree.description: The mystical Flamespyre Phoenix is a creature of legends, and forms a deadly pairing with the Anointed.

effects.description: Enables the Frlamespyre Phoenix mount for the Anointed

Passive Ability: "For the Phoenix King", while this Mount is equipped, for Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Swordplayer
skillTree.description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Blessings of Asuryan
skillTree.description: Where the Anointed tread, the doubts and fears of their allies vanish like mist on the wind. Blows that should prove fatal are turned aside at the last moment, enemy axes shatter on contact with shields and dark sorceries collapse inward at the moment of casting

skillTree.name: Militia Master
skillTree.description: Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bow Master
skillTree.description: Missile combat isn't always about attacking; knowing how to defend also pays dividends.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cavalry Master
skillTree.description: The Anointed has learned to utilise the might of the Ithlimar Chariots effectively, there is not much that can stand in their way.

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +3 for Ellyrian Reavers and Chariots
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +3% for Ellyrian Reavers and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +6 for Ellyrian Reavers and Chariots
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +6% for Ellyrian Reavers and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +10 for Ellyrian Reavers and Chariots
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for Ellyrian Reavers and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Boons of Vaul
skillTree.description: Those that risk their lives charging against the most hardened and destructive of their enemies need the best gear if they want to survive for long. Fortunately, Ulthuan´s gods are always willing to help the children of Asuryan

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +5 for Silver Helms and Dragon Princes
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +3 for Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +3% for Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +10 for Silver Helms and Dragon Princes
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +15 for Silver Helms and Dragon Princes
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Silver Helms and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Allies of Old
skillTree.description: When the island continent is in danger, not only the Asur march to defend their nation. For thousands of years, their stalwart allies have fought as hard as them to preserve the balance and harmony of Ulthuan

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +5 for Flying and Lion units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +3% for Flying and Lion units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +3% for Flying and Lion units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +10 for Flying and Lion units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +6% for Flying and Lion units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Flying and Lion units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +15 for Flying and Lion units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for Flying and Lion units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Flying and Lion units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Protectors of Ulthuan
skillTree.description: After fighting countless battles alongside the elite infantry of Ulthuan no Anointed of Asuryan will ever forget the lessons he has learned nor he will waste any chance to put them to good use

effects.description:
Armour: +3 for elite Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +4% for elite Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for elite Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +7% for elite Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for elite Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for elite Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Immovable Force
skillTree.description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Favourable Winds
skillTree.description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Archers and Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Silver Torrent
skillTree.description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Heart of the Flame
skillTree.description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Merchant Lord
skillTree.description: “Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.”

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Elven Scholar
skillTree.description: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Squishy
backgroundSkills.description: Some warriors are like rocks - hard and immovable. This one is like jelly…

backgroundSkills.name: Elusive
backgroundSkills.description: This one moves like lightning, ducking and twisting to avoid their opponent's blows.

backgroundSkills.name: Resilient
backgroundSkills.description: Armour is just a formality when you're as hard as nails and as tough as old boots.

backgroundSkills.name: Pigeon-Chested
backgroundSkills.description: Bones are not supposed to be on the outside.

backgroundSkills.name: Hale & Hearty
backgroundSkills.description: The very picture of good health. Clearly, there's many years still ahead of them.

backgroundSkills.name: Vigorous
backgroundSkills.description: This one is not at all easy to kill, and many have tried, believe me.

effects.description:
Leadership: -10 for White Lions of Chrace, Swordmasters of Hoeth and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Respectful
backgroundSkills.description: "Our forefathers followed the way and overcame great adversity. We should not ignore their lessons."

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for White Lions of Chrace, Swordmasters of Hoeth and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Doctrinal
backgroundSkills.description: "Right, are you listening? Good. There's only one way to do things and that's by the book."

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for White Lions of Chrace, Swordmasters of Hoeth and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for White Lions of Chrace, Swordmasters of Hoeth and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for White Lions of Chrace, Swordmasters of Hoeth and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Fay
backgroundSkills.description: There's something of the other world about this one; this cruel plane has failed to engage them.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong-Willed
backgroundSkills.description: Some minds are more susceptible to magical influence than others, but this one is strong indeed.

backgroundSkills.name: Dragon-Willed
backgroundSkills.description: Immovable and resolute in their will, this one is as determined as the World Dragon himself!

effects.description:
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Dragon units (minimum 1)
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Ill-Prepared
backgroundSkills.description: This one would forget their head if it wasn't, er, attached.

backgroundSkills.name: Competent
backgroundSkills.description: This one understands tactics, and how to vary them, well enough to generally defeat the foe.

backgroundSkills.name: Resistant
backgroundSkills.description: Action, inaction, change - you name it, this one will work against the prevailing wind.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 10% for infantry units
	(Lord's army)
